item.title: Affirmation Bot
item.description: #!/usr/bin/env python3 from pwn import * exe = ELF("./affirmationbot_patched") context.binary = exe context.terminal = ["alacritty", "-e"] gdb_script = """ b main b affirm c """ def conn(): if args.
